properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Priya yesu nirminchitivi priyamaara naa hrudayam Mudamara vasiyinchu naa hrudayantarangamuna{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee raktha prabavamuna na rotha hrudayambunu Pavitra parachumu tandri prati papamunu kadigi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ajaagarookudanaiti nijaashrayamu vidachi Karunaarasamuto nakai kanipettitivi tandri{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vikasinche visvaasambu vaakyambunu chaduvagane Cheriti needu daari kori nadipinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pratichota nee sakshigaa prabhuvaa nenundunatlu Atmaabishekamu nimmu aatmeeya rupunda{/lang-eng}
